mapper.select: select * from review_db order by rev_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into review_db(rev_tle, rev_con, u_idx, rev_dat, rev_up, rev_bor, rev_ref, rev_filename) value (#{rev_tle}, #{rev_con}, #{u_idx}, now(), '0', #{rev_bor}, #{rev_ref}, #{rev_filename})
mapper.update: update review_db set rev_hit = rev_hit + 1 where rev_idx = #{rev_idx}
